tire_types.description: Tire categories by surface and season.

usage_types.name: Road Touring
usage_types.description: Comfort, longevity, fuel economy for paved roads.

usage_types.name: Performance Summer
usage_types.description: Dry/wet grip at warm temps; higher speed ratings.

usage_types.name: Track Semi-Slick
usage_types.description: R-compound or semi-slick for track with limited wet performance.

usage_types.name: All-Terrain
usage_types.description: Balanced on/off-road with stronger sidewalls and tread.

usage_types.name: Mud Terrain
usage_types.description: Aggressive lugs for deep mud and off-road traction.

usage_types.name: Highway Terrain
usage_types.description: SUV/truck tires optimized for paved-road comfort and durability.

season_types.name: Summer
season_types.description: Optimized for warm temperatures; hardens in cold.

season_types.name: Winter
season_types.description: Soft compound and sipes for snow/ice; includes studded variants.

season_types.name: All-Season
season_types.description: Compromise for varied conditions but not specialized for extreme cold.

season_types.name: All-Weather
season_types.description: 3PMSF-rated for winter compliance while retaining year-round usability.
